modName: DWARF Elf Mixed Race Follower's - UNP - CBBE - STANDALONE
summary: They say "little things come in big packages" and this trio definitely packs a punch!
descriptionHtml:
[size=4][color=#00ff00]After the Dragonborn killed Alduin, the folks of Tamriel got a tad bored. This was especially true for a Wood Elf warrior named Valindor. Regretting his decision to leave home he was known for tapping into the mead a little too much and would often frequent with the ladies even when working at the Riften Fishery. After being told by three of the many woman he had "relations" with that they were pregnant, he fled and was never seen again. After the children were born and of age all three mothers had noticed their children were not getting any taller, yet aging. The three woman who had formed a bond decided it would be best to let a friendly Forsworn tribe they had met in their journeys, raise the children for fear they would be an outcast in all of Tamriel. The trio, now adult warriors trained in the Forsworn ways of defense, live in their home of Dead Crone Rock a Forsworn stronghold (Take a weapon and a torch or course). Now let's meet the girls....[/color]
[/size][url=http://funkyimg.com/view/2tL7R][img]http://funkyimg.com/i/2tL7R.jpg[/img][/url]
[color=#6d9eeb][size=4]THE RANGER, Alanna being a Wood Elf/Nord race prefers her Bow to other forms of attack. She is best used in
situations where you need a follower killing from a distance. Speed was increased making her a powerful asset even for a little person. Arrow damage also increased, to .75 (Beefed Up). [/size][/color][url=http://funkyimg.com/view/2tL7S][img]http://funkyimg.com/i/2tL7S.jpg[/img]
[/url][size=4][color=#00ff00]THE DUAL WIELDER, Lily prides herself in getting up close and personal. She is Wood Elf/Khajiit race and her speed was also increased meaning she has no trouble in chasing after enemies, and you definitely won't step on her tail... If you do I'd run because she has the "don't screw with me" face. [/color]
[color=#6d9eeb] [/color][/size][url=http://funkyimg.com/view/2tLmr][img]http://funkyimg.com/i/2tLmr.jpg[/img][/url]
[size=4][color=#6d9eeb]THE MAGICIAN, Malisha is ELF-Orc race and doesn't believe in using weapons and only relies on her[/color]
[color=#6d9eeb]Magic and Spells however, the fading of her Forsworn war paint shows indeed that she can hang with the best of them. Her speed was also increased so having all three ladies is a charm to watch fight for you while you kick back and have a sweet roll and some mead. [/color][color=#ff0000]Note: Fixed neck seam, fixed file now available for UNP version only. Thanks fmv![/color][/size][color=#ff0000]
[/color]
[u][color=#00ff00][size=4]Click on the VIDEO TAB at top of page to see them in action![/size] [/color][/u]

[color=#ff0000][size=4]INSTALLATION > Files were uploaded separately so you can pick n' choose who you want and what texture.
Just use NMM or manual to your tastes.

[/size][/color][size=4][color=#00ff00]STATS > ALL Three > .80 Height, .50 Weight 

All three have 500 Health, Magicka and Stamina

Speed increased to 150 

Weapons and or Spells > 

Alanna: Forsworn Bow with 3500 Forsworn arrows to start. 

Lily: 2 Forsworn axes. 

Malisha: Spells include Fireball, Flames Left Hand, Frostbite Right Hand, Ice Storm Left Hand and Lightning Bolt. 
[/color]
[color=#3c78d8]ARMOR: Forsworn Snow Leopard comes with them. NOTE: This armor replaces ALL Forsworn armor in game. If this isn't to your liking then follow the uninstall directions on Rekicker's page >http//www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/263/? [/color]
[color=#3c78d8]Also when installing more than one girl click either yes to all or no to all on overwrite in NMM for the Armor.[/color]

[color=#00ff00]REQUIREMENTS >
XP32 Maximum Skeleton Extended
HDT Physics Extensions 
[/color]

[color=#3c78d8]CREDITS:[/color]

[/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51602/?]FairSkin Complextion UNP Base:By HHaleyy[/url] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?]Caliente'sBeautiful Bodies Edition -[/url] UNP/CBBE

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311/?]KS Hairdos Renewal[/url] 

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/?]Eyes Of Beauty

[/url][url=http://www.loverslab.com/files/file/2123-half-khajiit-female-dagi-raht-khajiit-texture-replacer/]Half-Khajiit Female (Dagi-Raht Khajiit Texture Replacer)[/url] Awesome looking textures! By Norsewind 

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76828/?]Make A Follower Kit MAFK: By Ashes2Asherz (Great detailed tutorial so many thanks to
throw!)[/url] 

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/40494/?]Nif Merge:By Turulo (Great little tool!) [/url]  

[url=http://niftools.sourceforge.net/wiki/]NifSkope (A great tool for viewing meshes before adding them in CK and other neat stuff) [/url] 

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/4804/?]BSA Unpacker: By Wookie[/url]

XP32 Maximum Skeleton Extended
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53996/?]
HDT Physics Extensions: By HydrogensaysHDT [/url] 

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25859/?]TES5Edit3.2: By ElminsterAU (For saving me from many, many CTD's and other crap) [/url] 

[color=#00ff00][size=4]Bethesda for Creation Kit and of course Skyrim. 

Nexus for Nexus Mod Manager and everything else they do! 

Folgers for keeping me alive enough to create this mod!  

[u]RECOMMENDED[/u]:

Amazing Follower Tweaks: By Dheuster (MANY, many tweaks for Followers including changing outfits) 
NOTE: Make sure AFT is at BOTTOM of LOAD order and definitively
after any follower mods or conflicts can arise. 

The Manipulator (Google This) can set followers essential or non-essential kill unkillable people (jarl's, etc) and many more features. [/size][/color]
author: shrinkydink67
